abstracts.cdata!:
This restructuring for the Emergency
            Tsunami Reconstruction Project for India is to enable
            cancellation of US$69 million from the credit and further
            cancellation is likely. As a result of partial cancellation,
            the implementation progress will improve contributing to
            overall project risk reduction. There are no changes to the
            technical approach to the project, nor to the safeguards
            requirements under the project.
